title: Hailey and Justin Bieber's wedding planner shares photos of big day
text:
She helped Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin create the wedding of their dreams.

And now celebrity wedding planner Mindy Weiss has shared a new insight into the couple's big day - posting new photos to her Instagram account of the 'fairytale garden' themed reception.

'So blessed to have become friends with these two soulmates. We had a lot of fun planning the wedding together,' captioned Mindy in new photos of the bride and groom.

Scroll down for video

Never-seen-before photos: Hailey and Justin Beiber ave fans a look inside their lavish and luxurious $500,000 wedding on Monday

A real life fantasy! The loved up duo used celebrity wedding planner, Mindy Weiss, for extra help and went for a 'fantasy garden' for their floral theme

Fans were given an opportunity to take a look inside their lavish reception venue, complete with intense, elaborate hanging floral arrangements.

The modern, plan table featured many candles, and simple, chic table settings.

Luxury floral event designers, Mark's Garden, were in charge of the greenery, which saw foliage hanging down from the ceiling.

'Category is: #fantasyXmarksgarden,' they revealed, sharing the same image.

Candid: Hailey's stylist, Maeve Reilly, also shared some behind-the-scenes shots from the event

Hailey's stylist, Maeve Reilly, also shared some behind-the-scenes shots from the event.

'I know it was the best night of her life but it was kinda mine too?! Is that weird?' she captioned.

In the images the Vogue beauty stunned in her Ralph and Russo reception frock that featured a high neck and large slit up one side.

Reilly also shared some never seen before pictures of Hailey during her wedding rehearsal party.

The night before: Sitting on a boat with a drink in her hand, the bride stunned in a custom Vivienne Westwood mini-dress. She completed the leggy display with custom Jimmy Choo heels that had a tulle bow on the back

Sitting on a boat with a drink in her hand, the bride stunned in a custom Vivienne Westwood mini-dress.

She completed the leggy display with custom Jimmy Choo heels that had a tulle bow on the back.

Justin and Hailey married for a second time on September 30, 2019, in South Carolina.

They had a guest list of 150 people, including Kylie and Kendall Jenner, and spent approximately $500,000 in total splurging on everything from the lavish decorations to Mindy's wedding planner fees.

Dress number three: The Vogue beauty stunned in her Ralph and Russo reception frock that featured a high neck and large slit up one side

It takes an army: Maeve also posted a photo without Hailey when she was helping dress her in her statement veil

The loved-up duo wed at Montage Palmetto Bluff which on a Sunday one of the 198 rooms can cost $705.

Justin and Hailey rented out the entire venue so the bill would have been an estimated $106,000.

And Mindy's fees wouldn't have come cheap either. The Washington Post reports that her help can total up to $151,300.

Some other expenses include, $45,000 + for her staff, $48,000 for travel, $38,000 for lighting, $10,000 for the videographer.

It was estimated that Hailey and Justin spent approximately $625 a head on food and drinks (including the cake, craft cocktails and main courses) - totaling $93,750.

Gorgeous: Hailey wore a total of three dresses, opting for an Off-White custom design for the ceremony

Spared no expense: Justin and Hailey had a guest list of 150 people, including Kylie and Kendall Jenner, and spent approximately $500,000 in total from the lavish decorations to Mindy's wedding planner fees

Other things included the taxes, service charges, farewell brunch, Hailey's wedding dresses, $123,000 Tiffany & Co. diamond earrings, $4,300 wedding rings, and Justin's $50,000 watch and $25,000 grillz.

Justin Bieber has a net worth of $265 million while Hailey has a reported $3million to her name.

It is believed the stars married without a prenup during their courthouse ceremony on September 13, 2018.

It is unknown if they've since signed a post-nuptial agreement that would work the same way as a prenup would.
description: Hailey and Justin Beiber ave fans a look inside their lavish and luxurious $500,000 wedding on Monday. The pair's wedding planner shared some photos from their decor.
